title: How to write a personal letter - Quora

response.answer_text: Sounds interesting! Follow this format for writing a personal letter: _______________________________________________________________________[Insert Date] Dear [Insert name here], [Insert explanation of who you are and why you are writing him this letter] [Body paragraph going into more detail of your question/s] [Closing. E.g. “Respectfully,”] [Insert name] Write you letter out on a scrap piece of paper and proof read it before sending it off on a nicer piece of stationary. Hope this helped, -Annalia Fiore
